TLS Writing Contest

TLS is hosting a writing competition where the winning article will be posted on our blog! Details here.

Email submission to writingcontestTLS@gmail.com with “TLS Writing Contest” in the email subject line. File should be Word or PDF format. Submission deadline: Friday, March 2nd, 2018
